description.paragraph1: I'm a front-end and back-end web developer who really enjoys designing web pages and services that make things look awesome and work perfectly well.
description.paragraph2: I have been part of work teams as a member and also as a leader or coordinator, finding solutions for a variety of clients and using different types of technologies, frameworks and programming languages.
description.paragraph3_1: You can also find me as
description.paragraph3_2: as my nickname across some social media.
description.paragraph4: I am very interested in traveling, improving my English, getting to know new places and cultures, watching documentaries, movies and series, studying and learning new things and cooking delicious food as well.
